_meta.description: Enhanced prompt options with 12 categories (100 options each) and cleaned negative options. Category order optimized for prompt construction.

subject.label: Subject
subject.description: The main focus of the image - who or what
subject.tooltipGuidance: Choose one clear subject for sharp focus. Custom entries accepted.

action.label: Action / Pose
action.description: What the subject is doing or their posture
action.tooltipGuidance: Select one action or pose. Avoid conflicting movements.

style.label: Style / Rendering
style.description: Visual art style and rendering approach
style.tooltipGuidance: Pick up to 2 complementary styles. Avoid conflicting aesthetics.

environment.label: Environment
environment.tooltipGuidance: Choose one environment to ground your scene.

composition.label: Composition / Framing
composition.description: How the image is arranged and framed

camera.label: Camera
camera.description: Camera angle, lens, and technical settings
camera.tooltipGuidance: Pick up to 2 camera settings for technical precision.

lighting.label: Lighting
lighting.tooltipGuidance: Pick up to 2 lighting setups for mood and dimension.

colour.label: Colour / Grade
colour.description: Color palette, grading, and tonal treatment
colour.tooltipGuidance: Pick up to 2 colour treatments for visual harmony.

atmosphere.label: Atmosphere
atmosphere.tooltipGuidance: Pick up to 2 atmospheric effects for depth and mood.

materials.label: Materials / Texture
materials.tooltipGuidance: Pick up to 2 material textures for tactile realism.

fidelity.label: Fidelity
fidelity.tooltipGuidance: Pick up to 2 quality boosters for maximum detail.

negative.label: Constraints / Negative
negative.description: What to avoid or exclude from the image
negative.tooltipGuidance: Select up to 5 things to avoid. Platform-dependent: some convert to positive equivalents.
